name: df-tcph
body: |- wceq(ctcph, cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), ctng, cmpt(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s1), cfv(cip, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
bodyPretty: âŠ¢ toCPreHil =(s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦(s0[toNrmGrp](s1 âˆˆ(Base ` s0)â†¦(sqrt `(s1[(Â· ` s0)]s1)))))
comment: Define a function to augment a pre-Hilbert space with a norm. No extra parameters are needed, but some conditions must be satisfied to ensure that this in fact creates a normed subcomplex pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
